========= Ped2Fasta =========
----------- Description -----------
Convert PED file to Fasta File
----------------- Workflow position -----------------
**Upstream tool**
=============== ========================== ======= Name output file(s) format =============== ========================== ======= VCFtools Filter VCF file VCF =============== ========================== =======
**Downstream tool**
=========== ========================== ======= Name input file(s) format =========== ========================== ======= Readseq Fasta alignment fasta =========== ========================== =======
---------- Input file ----------
PED file PED file usually from VCF tools
---------- Parameters ----------
Output file name Prefix for the output fasta file
------------ Output files ------------
Fasta file PED file conversion
---------------------------------------------------

PED file ---------
::

Output name -> pedFile
